newsitem.title: USA: Metal Management to acquire HouTex Metals.
newsitem.headline: Metal Management to acquire HouTex Metals.

text.p: Metal Management Inc said Thursday it signed a definitive agreement to acquire HouTex Metals Co Inc for cash, notes payable, common stock and warrants to purchase common stock.
The merger is expected to close later this month.
HouTex Metals, based in Houston, Texas, generated annual revenues in excess of $20 million in its most recent fiscal year.
"This transaction allows Metal Management to participate in the consolidation of the scrap metal recycling business in a very attractive market," said chairman T. Benjamin Jennings.
Following the transaction, HouTex founders Mike and Sol Melnik will serve as chief executive officer and chief operating officer, respectively, of HouTex Metals.
As part of the acquisition, Mike Melnik will join Metal Management's board.
